channel.title: Runeagain 498 2008 remake
channel.description:
[center][498]RuneAgain[498][/center]
[center]client download http://runeagain.net/play/RuneAgain.jar[/center]
[center]website http://www.runeagain.net/[/center]
Features: -Duel Arena -All skills but construction -Auto Donation System -24/7 Uptime -Perfect Combat -Quests -All Magic Spells Working -All Ranged weapons -Most areas complete -Clan wars fully working - Vote system coming soon
Skills: > Flawless Combat System (Ranging, Magic, Melee) > Firemaking 100% (Dropping logs then Lighting em on fire, Cant light on top of other fires, Clipped) > Woodcutting (No Cutting from far away, Nests, etc) > Fishing (All fishing spots and All fishes) > Crafting (Gem Cutting/Crafting, Pottery, Tanning, Weaving, Leather Making, Spinning, Glass Blowing/Making, Hard Leather, SnakeSking, Dragon Skin) > Cooking (Brews, Dairy, Wine etc.) > Fletching (Normal Logs, Oak etc.., Arrow Making, Bow Stringing) > Mining (Mine Essence, Mine Ore) > Herblore (Cleaning, Grinding, Poison Making, Potion Making) > Thieving (Stalls, NPCs, Attacked when stealing from Stall) > Slayer > Smithing (Smelting) > Farming (Allotments, Bushes, Compost, Fruit Trees, Tool Leprechaun, Seedling, Mithril seeds, Etc.)
Random Events Treasure Trails (Map Scrolls, Puzzles, Sextant, etc..) Minigames: > Barrows > Castle Wars > Gnome Ball (Unfinished) > Mage Training Arena (Unfinished) > Duel Arena > Fight Caves
Transportation: > Gnome Glider > Magic Carpet > Sailing > Jewellery Teleports (Glory amulet)

[img]http://i57.tinypic.com/dmtkzk.png[/img]

item.title: Runeagain 498 2008 remake
item.dc:creator: @kaxman kaxman
item.description:
@kaxman wrote:

Mixed emotion on this game, started with it from start, played thru the drama, and supported it everywhere. Had great community, but alittle ticked when merged with server been around alot longer, and others came in and tuck over highscores and eco. But after fresh start, and a few original players really putting in time and money, came back…The heart is there and game is trying to overcome the drama of its past…So if you go a few mins, and ya put behind all the gossip, you’ll find a stead core of players, and the fact it has kept going in the face of all the drama says something to the heart of the core players, anyway please stop in… peace out//

Read full topic

item.title: Runeagain 498 2008 remake
item.dc:creator: @hollynye hollynye
item.description:
@hollynye wrote:

to be perfectly honest lots of the money then and now is from me and im only here to keep it open for those love it thats all i make nothing from this

i was and still am paying at least 20 a month to support this so was and is doug and sometimes we sent extra just cause they need it

Read full topic

item.title: Runeagain 498 2008 remake
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

hollynye:

After he got rid of all other admins and took all the money for taptap adverture or whatever it was he left us and shut it down so we came up with the money and jake and i bring it back up for those who still want a real 2008 remake so we would be happy for anyone who wants to join and check it out thanks

Wasn’t it his own money in the first place? Anywho, as long as you’re (hollynye) not in this for the profit, it seems alright to be hosting this for the players to enjoy.

Read full topic

item.title: Runeagain 498 2008 remake
item.dc:creator: @hollynye hollynye
item.description:
@hollynye wrote:

[center][498]RuneAgain[498][/center]

[center]client download http://runeagain.net/play/RuneAgain.jar[/center]

[center]website http://www.runeagain.net/[/center]

Features:
-Duel Arena
-All skills but construction
-Auto Donation System
-24/7 Uptime
-Perfect Combat
-Quests
-All Magic Spells Working
-All Ranged weapons
-Most areas complete
-Clan wars fully working

  • Vote system coming soon

Skills:

Flawless Combat System (Ranging, Magic, Melee)
Firemaking 100% (Dropping logs then Lighting em on fire, Cant light on top of other fires, Clipped)
Woodcutting (No Cutting from far away, Nests, etc)
Fishing (All fishing spots and All fishes)
Crafting (Gem Cutting/Crafting, Pottery, Tanning, Weaving, Leather Making, Spinning, Glass Blowing/Making, Hard Leather, SnakeSking, Dragon Skin)
Cooking (Brews, Dairy, Wine etc.)
Fletching (Normal Logs, Oak etc…, Arrow Making, Bow Stringing)
Mining (Mine Essence, Mine Ore)
Herblore (Cleaning, Grinding, Poison Making, Potion Making)
Thieving (Stalls, NPCs, Attacked when stealing from Stall)
Slayer
Smithing (Smelting)
Farming (Allotments, Bushes, Compost, Fruit Trees, Tool Leprechaun, Seedling, Mithril seeds, Etc.)

Random Events
Treasure Trails (Map Scrolls, Puzzles, Sextant, etc…)
Minigames:

Barrows
Castle Wars
Gnome Ball (Unfinished)
Mage Training Arena (Unfinished)
Duel Arena
Fight Caves

Transportation:

Gnome Glider
Magic Carpet
Sailing
Jewellery Teleports (Glory amulet)

Read full topic
